briefTitle: Proton Therapy for Early Stage Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Phase II Trial of Lumpectomy and Partial Breast Proton Therapy for Early Stage Breast Cancer

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Invasive ductal, medullary, papillary, colloid or tubular histologies
* Stages T1 or T2 (tumors \< or = 3 cm) from lumpectomy specimen.
* No more then 3 positive nodes on axillary dissection or negative sentinel node.
* Negative surgical margins (\>2mm)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Invasive lobular histology
* Previous chemotherapy for breast cancer
* Extensive intraductal component
* Collagen vascular disease
* Prior malignancy unless disease-free for 5 years
* Patients who are pregnant or lactating

primary.description: Lack of tumor recurrence in the treated breast as assessed by imaging and physical exam
primary.timeFrame: Up to 5 years post-treatment completion, average of 48 months

secondary.description: Overall survival rate at 5 years post-treatment completion.
secondary.timeFrame: Up to 5 years post- completion of treatment, average 48 months
